text: Nicki Minaj has always favored risqué looks with a futuristic twist ( remember when she pulled a Lil Kim a few months back at Paris Fashion Week with a metallic diamond pastie and purple Y2K - era shades? ), but she ’ s somehow managed to one - up herself in Migos ’ s new “ Motorsport ” video. The neon bright clip, which finds Quavo, Takeoff, and Offset rapping in front of fancy cars with DeLorean - esque doors, features a number of bold motocross - inspired custom - made Unravel looks from the Migos crew and Cardi B, but ultimately it ’ s Minaj ’ s lustrous outfit that shines the brightest. The rapper wears a full - body, high - neck custom latex
